snippet.title: Misao - 2024 HD Remaster | Release Trailer
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/691450

Explore a school plagued by unnatural phenomena in this horror-adventure game revolving around the missing girl Misao.
Not only have the graphics, user interface, and presentation been redone and updated for HD resolutions, new content has also been added.
Release on August 15, 2024! 

The quiet, plain, and reclusive Misao was often the target of bullies.
And three months ago, she suddenly went missing.
Ever since that day, there have been all kinds of unnatural events around campus.
Rumor has it that it's Misao's "curse"...
And when the school transforms into a terrifying and otherworldly place, that rumor is proven true.

■ Official Website: https://playism.com/en/game/misao-definitive-edition/
■ Developer: sen | Hitodenashi no kuukan　　■ Publisher: PLAYISM
©sen All Rights Reserved. Licensed to and published by Active Gaming Media Inc.
